title: What is the best technology for a future career? - Quora

response.answer_text: The technology sector is booming with people as well as opportunities, there are ample jobs for everyone as the innovation is not stopping anytime soon. There are some fast-growing jobs that are considered best for a future career: Dba(Database administrator)-The main job is to manage an organization’s data. They ensure that databases run efficiently and protect them from unauthorized users. They also organize a company’s data and storing it efficiently. Web developers -Web application developers use programming languages and then create online software as per client specifications. A developer may work in different programming languages and operating systems. A prospective web application developer has the most coding boot camp courses available to them. Software Developers-software developers create applications and build systems that are used inside computers. They are programmers in disguise since technology is at its peak software is the heart in everything. Mobile App Developers - Mobile app developers create new products or develop new features in existing ones for use on phones and tablets. Creative companies across industries, including video game studios, advertising, and marketing firms, now recognize mobile as a powerful and app development is a hot platform to work on. Developers are also in demand from government agencies, financial institutions, and industries that need more apps to make their operations run more efficiently. Data Analyst-Computer systems analysts check a company’s computer systems and process, then revamp and makes changes for the organization operates and flourish. Security Analyst-Information security analysts coordinate and execute to protect the computer networks and systems in a company. The people in these positions is adaptability to change because a security breach can occur at any time. Data Scientist - Data science is an interdisciplinary field that uses scientific methods, processes, algorithms, and systems to extract knowledge and insights from structured and unstructured data. Data science is related to data mining and big data. Artificial intelligence/machine learning: The most important responsibilities engineers in this field are roughly the Running machine experiments using a programming language with machine learning libraries.
